trans-unit.source: A trigger action that stops a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref>.
Use a StopStoryboard action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to interactively stop a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
trans-unit.target: Należy użyć akcji StopStoryboard z <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>lub <xref:System.Windows.Trigger>interaktywnie zatrzymać <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: StopStoryboard only affects a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> when it is active (after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> starts).

Stopping a storyboard triggers the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.CurrentStateInvalidated> events, but not the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Completed> event.

Rather, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> must reference the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> that controls the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>.
See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for an example.
trans-unit.target: Zobacz [porady: Użyj wyzwalacze zdarzeń do kontrolowania scenorysu po jego uruchomieniu](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) przykład.

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or StopStoryboard) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Wstrzymaj, Wznów, Zatrzymaj lub w przeciwnym razie kontroli scenorysu interaktywnie móc wstrzymać, wznowić lub inny sposób kontroluje <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>interaktywnego, ustaw <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>Właściwość jego <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>i użyj <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>obiektu (takich jak <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, lub StopStoryboard) można sterować nim za pomocą odwołań do jego <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Jeśli <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>z <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>jest nieokreślony, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>nie interaktywnie sterować po rozpoczyna się.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](../Topic/How%20to:%20Use%20Event%20Triggers%20to%20Control%20a%20Storyboard%20After%20It%20Starts.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Zobacz [porady: użycie wyzwalacze zdarzeń do kontrolowania scenorysu po jego uruchomieniu](../Topic/How%20to:%20Use%20Event%20Triggers%20to%20Control%20a%20Storyboard%20After%20It%20Starts.md) Aby uzyskać więcej informacji.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard"></xref> class.
